definition: old lady/Madam (polite address)/CL:位[wei4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
mother/young lady/(coll.) effeminate

sentences.english: The fruit seller palmed off some bad oranges onto the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 那水果商把一些壞桔子混充好的賣給了那位老大娘。

sentences.english: If he refused to come, he would hurt the feelings of the old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他如果不肯來，就會使老大娘不高興。

sentences.english: The old woman sat silent, as if care were pressing on her mind.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘坐着不開口，好像有什麼心事壓在她心頭似的。

sentences.english: Granny's kindness endeared her to everyone in the community.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘的仁慈心地使她受到這一帶所有人的喜愛。

sentences.english: The old woman told him that she had two grandsons at the front.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘告訴他說，前線上有她兩個孫子。

sentences.english: He made it his business to fetch water for a granny.
sentences.chinese: 他把爲一位老大娘挑水當作本人的事。

sentences.english: The old women are near the table. They are dancing.
sentences.chinese: 在球檯附近有些老大娘在跳舞。

sentences.english: When he awoke, he found himself being looked after by an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他醒來的時間發現一位老大娘正在照料他。

sentences.english: The roof of the granny's hut came down during the night.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘草屋的屋頂在夜間塌下來了。

sentences.english: He old woman made a living by washing clothes for others.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘通過幫助別人洗衣服謀生。

sentences.english: I met a granny on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我在回家的路上碰上一位老大娘。

sentences.english: Old Mother Adams next door has lost her cat again.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁亞當斯老大娘的貓又不見了。

sentences.english: The old woman struggled along the road to her home.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘掙扎着往家裏走去。

sentences.english: It is an act of kindness to help the old woman to do something.
sentences.chinese: 幫助這位老大娘做事情是一種良好的舉動。

sentences.english: He gave up his seat to an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他把座位讓給了一位老大娘。

sentences.english: When he awoke， he found himself being looked after by an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他醒來的時候發現一位老大娘正在照顧他。

definition: uncle/grandpa/CL:位[wei4]
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
(coll.) father's older brother's wife/aunt (polite address)
elderly lady (respectful)/esteemed mother/CL:位[wei4]
"Madam" (affectionate term for an elderly woman)/CL:位[wei4]
old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
arrogant idler/self-centered show-off
(coll.) father's father's father/paternal great-grandfather
old lady
grandpa (polite form of address for old man)
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
old man/I (an old man referring to himself)
granny/mother-in-law
father's elder brother's wife/aunt (affectionate term for an elderly woman)
